testcase.name: create SIM, create Prepaid and Postpaid subscriber and gather logs, screenshots and DB data
testcase.system-out: Given Configurations........................................................passed When Create SIM.............................................................passed And Create Account..........................................................passed And Start LogCollector......................................................passed And Create "Prepaid" Subscriber with PP "100026" and initial Balance "$1000.00".passed And Collect Logs............................................................passed And Gather "Account" level "Transactions"...................................passed And Gather "Account" level "Notes"..........................................passed And Gather "Account" level "UsageBalance"...................................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "MobileNumberTab".............................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "BillingInfoTab"..............................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "RatingTab"...................................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "Transactions"................................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "Notes".......................................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "UsageBalance"................................passed And Gather "Subscriber" level "CallDetails".................................passed And GatherDBData using query "getTransactions"..............................passed Then Verify that subscriber created in "Activated" state....................passed
